headline: Is Church & Dwight (CHD) Pricing Power Enough To Support Its Current Valuation?
summary: If you are wondering whether Church & Dwight at around US$96.25 is offering fair value or stretching expectations, this article walks through what the current price might be implying about the business. Over the short term the stock has had mixed results, with a 4.7% return over the last 7 days and 16.5% over the past month and year to date, set against a 1 year return of an 8.4% decline, a 3 year return of 19.7%, and a 5 year return of 24.0%. Recent attention on Church & Dwight has centered...
